title: My league keeps freezing my computer.
body: Every time I play a game now I get into the game and my screen freezes and makes a weird noise and I have to restart my computer. Sometimes it lets me play but freezes near the end or at the end. I turned my graphics down and it still didn't help. I don't know what to do because i can't play anything and now i'm on a 20 minute wait time for games.

replies.body: Have you recently updated to Windows 10?  The freezing and weird noise has been an issue for some players, and seems to be caused by some change with the xbox game bar.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
Yes this fixed it. Thanks so much!
This is happening to my friend too. He's at 20 minute queue times and is do confused and discouraged to play now since he cant control the random freezing.
Samething happens to me I even reset my computer to factory settings and nothing

That sounds like one of your computer parts needs to be replaced I'm pretty sure.
Most likely your GPU.
My computer has been running the game fine for over a year and this has just started to happen to me about two weeks ago.
